section.p: A company with three salesmen has the objective that each salesman sells for at least $ 150,000 per year. If that amount is reached their commission will be 6.25% of that sales amount. If not, then their commission will be only 5.5%. In the following figure, you see a model to calculate the commission for each salesman.
Create this model in a worksheet and use formulas for the calculation of the commissions.
